Package ch.nolix.core.specificationInterfaces

Interface Specifiable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resettable, Specified, Typed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    _3DGUI, Area, BackgroundWidget, BaseShape, BlackNBlueDesign, BlackRedConsoleDesign, BorderWidget, Button, CheckBox, ConfigurableElement, Configuration, ConfigurationElement, Console, Container, Cuboid, DeepConfiguration, DefaultDesign, Entity, Frame, GreenConsoleDesign, GreenDesign, GreyBlueConsoleDesign, GUI, HorizontalLine, HorizontalStack, InvisibleGUI, JMonkeyMainFrame, Label, Line, MainFrame, MultiShape, MutableElement, NamableElement, OptionalNamableElement, Shape, SingleContainer, Sphere, Stack, StandardConfiguration, TabContainer, TabContainerTab, TextBox, TextLineWidget, VerticalLine, VerticalStack, VisibleGUI, Widget

    public interface Specifiable
extends Resettable, Specified
    A specifiable object is a specified object: -Whose all official attributes can be mutated uniquely. -Whose all official attributes can be reset together.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
